messages.message:
Has anyone been asked to run Py4J to enable dev to write java for udf etc - Customer is a massive java shop

cc: @nichols
cc @Kerry ^? We just got off a call with UBS and theyre a heavy java shop.

hey, this is the first time iâ€™m seeing this kind of request. short answer is this is not doable with the platform today and will require a big amount of work. i am not familiar with py4j, but just reading the description it is not a Java to Python converter also / does not help with letting people write Java as a UDF in our architecture.
